attributes.action: to ensure that the land known as Farnham Park Golf Course is not sold by South Bucks District Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This land was given to the people of firstly Eton Rural District Council and subsequently South Bucks District Council for the Residents to enjoy Golf and other sports.  It is a Charity but the Council are of the opinion they can sell the Course to a Private Person/Company.  We believe that it should remain a MUNICIPAL COURSE and the Council have no right to sell what belongs to the People.
